Journal.Title: Neurological sciences : official journal of the Italian Neurological Society and of the Italian Society of Clinical Neurophysiology

Article.ArticleTitle: Broadening the clinical spectrum of FUS mutations: a case with monomelic amyotrophy with a late progression to amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.
